description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with Metabase by accessing dashboards, questions, and databases as resources. Execute Metabase queries and retrieve structured data to enhance data-driven conversations. Simplify data exploration and querying within your AI workflows.

metabaseUrl.description: URL of the Metabase instance (e.g. https://your-metabase-instance.com)

capabilities.name: list_dashboards
capabilities.description: List Metabase dashboards. Can be filtered.

capabilities.name: list_cards
capabilities.description: List Metabase cards (questions/models). Can be filtered.

capabilities.name: list_databases
capabilities.description: List Metabase databases. Can be filtered.

capabilities.name: execute_card
capabilities.description: Execute a Metabase question/card and get results

capabilities.name: get_dashboard_details
capabilities.description: Get full details for a specific dashboard, including its dashcards and parameters.

capabilities.name: execute_query
capabilities.description: Execute a SQL query against a specified database.
